column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////There's a reason why Common Bond always has a line to the door.  Their pastries are to die for delicious and their seasonal savory menu is always delicious.  I won't dive into that menu since it's constantly changing so I'll stick to the classics.  Almond croissant and chocolate chip cookie.  That's really all you need to know.  Also
column2: since they've opened they have also stepped up their coffee game a ton.
